Hi!

I don't own any of the characters from any of the series I write for. "sighs" I do however, own the plot bunnies that inspired them! "winks"

I'm also known as kiramaru7 over at LJ & DA

Someone to go visit for some good ficcage:

chesirejin whom I beta for, who's written some awesome ficcage for Friuts Basket amongst other series, such as Full Metal Alchemist and Kyo Karas Maoh! Check out the one shot she wrote for Inuyasha called Lizard Juice. Please take a minute and let her know how much you like her ficcage! "smiles"

She also did the cover art for Youkai! Click here to see it.

My friend Lizzie did some fanart for me. You can see the pix over at her DA gallery.

Like my Bo7 ficcage? Then check out, Trust & betrayal over at my co-author's Vega Sailor, account! ;p

Want to really make my day? Leave me some feedback on one of my fics, especially one that either has no reviews or very few. You might get lucky and I'll write you something as a thank you. So don't forget to log in!
